Articles.Content: Im looking for parts that i can use to make nicer looking rovers? Ive been looking but i havent been able to find what i am looking for yet. Any suggestions?

I would use Infernal Robotics with the Model Rework & Expansion packs (robotics and structural trusses),  DMagic Orbital Science (lots of equipment for experiments),  Hullcam VDS (lots of cameras), Kerbal Foundries (wheels and tracks),  Speedy's Hex Truss System ( It has some good structural parts to make a rover deployment platform). To change the look of some of the parts I would use Ven's Stock Rework. This is my Spirit and Curiosity rovers that uses all the mods listed. 

 

Edited April 12, 2016 by hellblazer
Nice ones! @ZodiusInfuser, take a look!
